rdf:Description.rdfs:label: foaf:familyName (SKG-IF labels: family_name)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The family name of a Person.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * foaf:Person
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: SKG-O: agent
rdf:Description.dc:title: The SKG-IF Ontology: agent
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Scientific Knowledge Graphs â€“ Interoperability Framework (SKG-IF) WG
rdf:Description.dc:rights: This work is distributed under a Creative Commons Attribution License (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/legalcode)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: SKG-O, the SKG-IF Ontology, is not yet another bibliographic ontology. Rather it is just a place where existing and complementary ontological entities from several other ontologies, all employed in the Scientific Knowledge Graph Interoperability Framework (SKG-IF), are grouped together for the purpose of providing descriptive metadata compliant with the SKG-IF Data Model.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pro:withRole (SKG-IF labels: role)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The role that a Person had in the context of an Organisation. Needed for parsing purposes; fixed to `affiliate`.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * pro:RoleInTime
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * pro:Role

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: foaf:givenName (SKG-IF labels: given_name)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The given name of a Person.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * foaf:Person
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ti:hasIntervalStartDate (SKG-IF labels: start)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The start datetime of the affiliation with an Organisation. The string should be compliant with the ISO 8601 datetime string.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * ti:TimeInterval
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: foaf:Agent
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* datacite:hasIdentifier -[0..N]-> datacite:Identifier * foaf:name -[0..1]-> rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: datacite:hasIdentifier (SKG-IF labels: identifiers)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Objects representing external identifiers for the entity.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * foaf:Agent
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * datacite:Identifier

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ti:hasIntervalEndDate (SKG-IF labels: end)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The end datetime (if any) of the affiliation with an Organisation. The string should be compliant with the ISO 8601 datetime string.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * ti:TimeInterval
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: foaf:Person
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* foaf:familyName -[0..1]-> rdfs:Literal * foaf:givenName -[0..1]-> rdfs:Literal * pro:holdsRoleInTime -[0..N]-> pro:RoleInTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: datacite:usesIdentifierScheme (SKG-IF labels: scheme)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The scheme for the external identifier.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * datacite:Identifier
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * datacite:IdentifierScheme

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pro:relatesToOrganization (SKG-IF labels: affiliation)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The identifier of an Organisation a Person is affiliated with.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * pro:RoleInTime
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * foaf:Organization

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: foaf:Organization
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* foaf:homepage -[0..1]-> foaf:Document * frapo:hasAcronym -[0..1]-> rdfs:Literal * frapo:hasCountry -[0..1]-> rdfs:Literal * skos:altLabel -[0..N]-> rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ti:TimeInterval
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* ti:hasIntervalEndDate -[0..1]-> xsd:dateTime * ti:hasIntervalStartDate -[0..1]-> xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pro:holdsRoleInTime (SKG-IF labels: affiliations)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: All the affiliations of a Person (Ã la ORCID).
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * foaf:Person
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * pro:RoleInTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: foaf:name (SKG-IF labels: name)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The string containing whatever concatenation of an Agent name(s).
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * foaf:Agent
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frapo:hasAcronym (SKG-IF labels: short_name)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The short name/acronym for an Organisation.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * foaf:Organization
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pro:RoleInTime
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* pro:relatesToOrganization -[1]-> foaf:Organization * pro:withRole -[0..1]-> pro:Role * tvc:atTime -[0..1]-> ti:TimeInterval

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: skos:altLabel (SKG-IF labels: other_names)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Other names, perhaps in different languages, identifying an Organisation.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * foaf:Organization
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tvc:atTime (SKG-IF labels: period)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The time period where the Person was affiliated with an Organisation. It includes the following information:
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * pro:RoleInTime
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * ti:TimeInterval

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frapo:hasCountry (SKG-IF labels: country)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The country code of an Organisation expressed as ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * foaf:Organization
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: foaf:homepage (SKG-IF labels: website)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The website URL for an Organisation.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * foaf:Organization
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * foaf:Document

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: datacite:Identifier
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* datacite:usesIdentifierScheme -[1]-> datacite:IdentifierScheme * literal:hasLiteralValue -[1]-> rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: literal:hasLiteralValue (SKG-IF labels: value)
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * datacite:Identifier
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * rdfs:Literal
